name: Portfolio website
description: A project where people interested in my work can see my best and latest projects, so they can be interested in work with me

name: Vegan restaurant
description: In this project I developed a multi page website where customers can see what this restaurant offers, book a table and check the real location.

name: Package tracker
description: A project where I switch from a static JSON file to a real API call to obtain and present data from a server.

name: TTD Todo
description: This wishlist allows you to add the items you want to buy. Here I learned about testing too.

name: BBQ Restaurant
description: In this restaurant app, as an admin you're able to administrate your restaurant menu. You can add, delete and modify the items of your menu. In this app, you don't need to login, just go to https://kathe-rojas-bbq-restaurant.web.app/dashboard

name: Learning platform
description: A small yet complete, Learning Management System (LMS) platform that allows to create student accounts and add more full stack features. For now, this app works only for teachers who can add content using katherojas@novareacademy.com as the email and kathe1234 as the password. The student feature will be developed soon

name: Netflix clone
description: You can create an user account anytime, and signin as an admin to add content with the email eduardo@netflix.com and the password eduardo1234

name: Recipe Search
description: A web application built with Java and Spring Boot that allows users to search for recipes based on available ingredients. It simplifies meal planning by providing tailored recipe suggestions, promoting resource optimization and culinary creativity
